articles.author: Lawrence Richard
articles.title: Republican has message for every lawmaker after Falls Township shooter kills 3: 'That needs to change' - Fox News
articles.description: Rep. Brian Fitzpatrick, R-Penn., warned of the consequences America faces should it not address mental health, after a suspect shot and killed three people in Pennsylvania on Saturday.
